title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Tenant-level analytics for Power Automate
description:
,Admins can use out-of-box reports to monitor usage and track inventory of Cloud Flows used for automation procedures across the organization at the tenant and environment level.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/tenant-level-analytics
GA date: April CY2022
Preview date: February CY2022
